location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.4881 of 1856 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Commander Felix Jones, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is a covering letter, enclosing a Resolution by the Board (folio 117), dated 21 October 1856, which reports the satisfactory reports of affairs at Sharjah by the British Agent [Hajjī Yaqoob], the truce agreed between the Joasmee [Qāsimī] chief and the Shaikhs in league with the tribes of Himreyah [Ḩamrīyah], and the continued focus on affairs on the Arab coast to prevent further breach of maritime treaties.
